item.title: Deep learning resources
item.description: References that I found interesting and helpful Books Murphy, Probabilistic Machine Learning (intro) (advanced) Courses NYU Grad Deep Learning (2021) UvA Deep Learning Notebooks (link) UofT Deep Learning: Theory & Data Science (link) UofT Statistical Methods for Machine Learning II (2024), (2023)
